content.description: In between the starts of Naval Power and Fuck Nut. Start on a left hand deep 3 finger pocket, and right hand sloper. Do a big move up to the crimp of Naval Power and finish Naval Power. Crux is the first move.

Low start to Saturn III. Start on a two-finger pocket with the right hand and a sloped pinch with the left hand. A good right foot and a smear left foot gets you to the start of Saturn. Adds three moves.
content.location: Start holds, right under Saturn/Naval Power.

content.description: Sit start to Fuck Nut. Start in the hueco and use the undercling to move onto the starting move of Fuck Nut. Makes Fuck Nut feel like a true climb. Might be one of the best lines in the park.
content.location: Sit start to Fuck Nut on Scrunchy Wall.

content.description: Begin with hands in shallow, incut, two-finger pockets. Gaston the poor sidepull on Supernugget. Go straight up.

Sit start on a decent sloper rail and move up to a bad left sidepull.  Move up to another bad sidepull (right) before topping out.  **There is a possible two-finger edge that could be used as an intermediate.**  Crux is moving through bad sidepulls.
content.location: Just to the right of F#&* Nut and left of Dry Goods.

climbs.name: Scrunchy Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Chicks

content.description: Start on Basic Female, traverse under the lip through Low Rider and Dirt Bag until you hit the jug on Saturn. Top out. Crux is not pumping out because the feet are so bad.

climbs.name: Scrunchy Wars: Episode I - The Nut Menace

content.description: Start on Fuck Nut Low, finish Drier Goods. Crux is moving through the two 2-finger pockets.

Same start as Naval Power. Move left off the slanted jugs to a crimp and up to a left gaston. Finish either straight up or move left.  

  Crux is move to the gaston.
content.location: Same sit start as Naval Power.

content.description: Start in a small left hand dish and right hand gaston. Move up right into a jug.
content.location: In the blank space between Earn Your Supper and Alterna-ChickÂ

content.description: Links Naval Power and Fuck Nut. Begin on Naval Power's start holds. Move up right into crimps. Left of Fuck Nut there is a good right hand pocket that can be used to transition between the two problems. Finish Fuck Nut.
Sit start with two hands on jugs facing right, then right to a side pull crimp, to a under-cling and up

Low start to Low Rider. Start on left hand 3-finger and right hand 2 finger under the lip of the wall. Lock off and bump through a pocket to reach the starting hold of Low rider.

 Crux is locking off so you don't dab.

Small edge (right hand) with a mono pocket just off to the left (left hand). Tricky foot positioning from the sit start; there is a small pocket (left foot) to cram your toes into. Crank off the start to the left and reach a good edge.  Move to a crimp jug (right) and move a sidepull (left).  Make one more move to a left facing flake and reach for the top. Crux is the first two moves of the problem.  

  Typical Mckinney problem. Definitely hard for its grade.
content.location: Located left of Dirtbag and Naval Power.

content.description: sit start- start left hand on good edge, right hand on smaller one, go to good edge then sidepull.
Start on a left hand wide pinch and right hand sidepull slightly lower. Dyno straight to the top as the FA, or use bad intermediate holds to get your feet up and pop to the top.
content.location: Just left of Alterna Chick and right of the ending of 9 pound hammer.

content.description: Sit start on jugs.  Move into an unusual pocket and up into a two pocket pinch. Transition onto a small sloping horn before popping to the top.  Crux is moving off the first pocket into the pinch.  Right facing flake on the right is off; otherwise, it's a Mckinney V0.
content.location: Right of F#%& Nut and Super Nugget.  Right side of the Scrunchy Wall.

content.description: Same problem as Dried Goods; however, right facing flake on right side is on.  Right flake has a low pocket on bottom and a high sharp jug on top.  Exponentially easier.  Good warmup or intro to Mckinney Falls bouldering.
content.location: Same as Dried Goods. Right side of Scrunchy Wall.

content.description: Low start to Dirt Bag. Start on two third-pad crimps, go to start of Dirt Bag.Â
content.location: Start holds are below and to the right of the starting rail of Dirt Bag.

content.description: Match on a small slopey edge.  Make a BIG move to a good edge.  You can then either go to the top or move to the right sidepull before making a move to the top.  Crux is the first move of the route; the slopey edge has a decent thumb-catch to pull off of.  The key to the first move is finding good feet to crank off.
Low start to Alterna-Chick. Start on good 2 finger pocket for left, bad 2 finger or chossy flake for the right. Climb straight into Alterna-Chick and finish it.

SDS on a wide ledge.  Pull into 2 tiny crimps and move into a "right-facing feature" that can be crimped as well.  Crux is finding the 2 crimps and being able to pull off them.  Route is hard for its grade.
content.location: Located to the left of Low Rider

content.description: Short wall just to the left of the access tree
